data.description: Space Dodge2 lets you assume the role of an airship pilot in the far distant future. You'll embark on a journey to execute a secret mission and travel across the galaxy in the process. The difficulties you'll face will only depend on your piloting ability. Take flight!

changelog.change_log:
Update V1.0.11 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,

Space Doge2's latest update optimizes the game interface, including the performance of text and props.
Added the function of returning to the main menu in the opening item interface. Avoid the situation that gem is not enough to buy prop.Store promotions are still ongoing.

Thank you for your continued support
- The Chesstar Team

Update V1.0.10 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,

Space Doge2's latest update introduces an opening prop. Players can choose to purchase different types of items before the game starts, which will help you better experience the game.Read on for more details on this update.

Opening props
Super power   Spaceship will start at high speed.
Super magnet  Spaceship will absorb all gems until it is destroyed.
Infinite bullet  Bullets will not have to be reloaded.Fire!Fire!

Thank you for your continued support
- The Chesstar Team

Update V1.0.9 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,

Space Doge2's latest update fixes the bug that select the locked spaceship without prompting.Thanks to the player Chengming Tao who made the suggestion!We welcome all players to make suggestions,Space Doge 2 will continue to update.In addition, store promotions are still in progress.

Thank you for your continued support
- The Chesstar Team

Update V1.0.8 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,

Space Doge2's latest update  fixes the bug that the leaderboard scores scores displayed as 0 and the leaderboard cannot be paged. Apologize to everyone who has experienced the leaderboard feature.

Thank you for your continued support
- The Chesstar Team

Update V1.0.7 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,

Space Doge2's latest update introduces new feature props and optimized game experience.

Read on for more details on the important update and optimization adjustment.

Important Update
-Function prop
    Super Energy Bottle: The spacecraft enters an invincible state and sprints forward quickly
    Pause bottle: let the whole space slow down
-Reward route: Open up additional ways to get rewards, players can get more gems   or energy blocks
-Store Offer: Launched a bonus event to purchase gems, and more value-for-money doubling rewards for the first time!

Optimization Adjustment 
-Leaderboard display: the information obtained by the record shows more specific
-Upgrade effect: the level of the spacecraft upgrade is more refined
-Sound effects: upgraded the sound effects in the game

Thank you for your continued support
- The Chesstar Team
